### The evolution of modularity

To which degree modules are a byproduct of evolutionary dynamics and a byproduct of ecology. Are modules a byproduct of generalists/specialist dynamics at broader taxonomical scales [@Espinosa-Soto2010d]? Or the product of specialisation that resulysin reduced comperition with other exploiters -- a reduction of niche overlap -- [@Poisot2013c]
